subject: Mascots
Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: A University of Minnesota fan was barred from the Sports Pavilion and Williams Arena for a year for punching the university mascot, Goldy Gopher, in the face at a gymnastics meet.
snippet: A University of Minnesota fan was barred from the Sports Pavilion and Williams Arena for a year for punching the university mascot, Goldy Gopher, in the face at a gymnastics meet.
